intro: Hold back endless hordes and save the New Year as a mighty mage-monk. Grow stronger, gather artifacts, and smite your foes with holy power.
description:
MEGAMONK is a fast-paced roguelike survival experience where a mage-monk stands alone against relentless hordes of darkness threatening the New Year and Halloween. Every battle erupts into a whirlwind of holy magic, strikes, and explosive energy that grows with your power. Collect artifacts, discover rare upgrades, and forge devastating ability combinations capable of wiping out entire armies.
On the battlefield, you will face winterstorm demons, Halloween-born abominations, and ancient spirits of chaos determined to erase the holidays from existence. Their power rises with every passing minute, challenging your resilience and mastery.
Defend the New Year, preserve the spirit of celebration, and prove that monastic magic can stand against any darkness. Step into the fray, unleash the full potential of the monk, and become a legend whose name echoes louder than festive bells.
